DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the clinical investigation is to assess the clinical and subjective performance of three novel multipurpose disinfecting solutions (MPDS) in daily wear with two silicone hydrogel contact lenses (Lotrafilcon B and Comfilcon A).
DOC.brief_title: The Clinical and Subjective Performance of Three Different MPDS With Silicon Hydrogel Lenses
DOC.criteria: age above 18 experienced contact lens user good health (selfreported) eye disease or eye operations pregnancy medication that can affect sight
